para.text: This section explains how to connect the main power supply from the factory and connect the ground to the machine body

list.style: text-align:justify; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:48px; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Confirm that the "Main Power" switch is turned off.

list.style: text-align:justify; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.18; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Feed the wiring for the power cables through the top or bottom of the Machine Tool Cabinet and connect it to the main power circuit breaker.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-23px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:11px; margin-left:91px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:145px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-23px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:11px; margin-left:91px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:145px left ;
li.text: Remove the mounting screws [2] and the "Main Power" switch cover [1].

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-23px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:11px; margin-left:91px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:145px left ;
li.text: Connect the ground line to the ground connection ports [5].

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-23px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:91px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:145px left ;
li.text: Connect the power cables [3] to the terminals of the power connection ports [4].

list.style: text-align:justify; margin-top:8px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.18; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Check the Power source phase rotation with a phase rotation indicator. Confirm the phase connection by checking the Coolant pump fan (M2) [6] rotation. It must be rotating in counterclockwise direction.

list.style: text-align:justify; margin-top:8px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.18; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Check the voltage is within the specification: 380~415V (50/60 Hz).
Secure the power cable along the routing route with cable ties to prevent movement.
Mount the "Main Power" switch cover [1] and secure it with the mounting screws [2].

para.text: This completes connection of the wiring.
